text: Farzin Garousian (); is an Iranian footballer who last played as a goalkeeper for Esteghlal Khuzestan. He was released by Tractor in June 2018. == References == Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers Category:Esteghlal F.C. players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Esteghlal Khuzestan F.C. players
title: Farzin Garousian
